headline: Bristol Myers Squibb Advances Lymphoma Research with New Targeted Protein Degradation and Cell Therapy Data at ASH 2025
summary: PRINCETON, N.J., December 08, 2025--Bristol Myers Squibb Advances Lymphoma Research with New Targeted Protein Degradation and Cell Therapy Data at ASH 2025

headline: Will Cobenfy Become a Growth Driver for BMY's Neuroscience Business?
summary: Bristol Myers Squibb moves forward with its ADEPT-2 study on Cobenfy, delaying data to next year but boosting investor sentiment.

headline: Leerink Maintains Outperform Rating as Bristol Myers (BMY) Expands ADEPT-2 Enrollment
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is included among the 14 Best US Stocks to Buy for Long Term. On December 4, Leerink analyst David Risinger maintained an Outperform rating on Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY). The analyst highlighted that the company plans to enroll more patients in the ADEPT-2 study and sees this as a positive development. […]
